came back to the game after a 2 and a half year break of not playing and i remember why i stopped playing it. if youre in low silver, good luck ever getting out. no one uses mics unless they are flaming someone else or to call you some slur.  i know the game is free now, but there are better uses for your time if you are just now getting into game. stop while you still can.
